hero.description: GKX is a full-stack project powered by Next.js, Prisma and Supabase, with feed, messaging, user graph and AI chat capabilities ready for extension.

social.title: Social Interaction Loop
social.description: Supports posting, replying, liking, sharing and user relationships to keep content moving.

ai.title: AI Conversation Layer
ai.description: Built-in GKX AI with history, auto session titles and streaming responses.

security.title: Auth & Data Safety
security.description: Backed by Supabase Auth and PostgreSQL/Prisma for consistent authorization and data access.

workflow.title: Launch Path
workflow.tag: Ready for personal projects and portfolio

first.title: Login and create identity
first.description: Use your account to sign in and enter your profile and social feed quickly.

second.title: Publish and connect
second.description: Post, reply and follow people to build a sustainable content graph.

third.title: Use GKX AI for creation
third.description: Ask questions, organize ideas and keep multi-turn conversations in one place.

cta.title: Start with GKX now
cta.description: From social feed to AI workspace, the core modules are already wired together. Extend your business features directly.

Help.heroSubTitle: Find the support and answers you need
Help.contactIntro: If you still need help, please contact us via:

1.question: How do I sign up?
1.answer: Click the login button in the top-right corner, choose sign up, then fill in email and password. You can also sign in with Google.

2.question: How can I post updates?
2.answer: After login, use the input box on home or profile page, type your content and click publish. You can also add images and emojis.

3.question: How do I edit my profile?
3.answer: Open your profile by clicking your avatar, then click edit profile to update nickname, avatar and bio.

4.question: How do I follow users?
4.answer: Open the profile you are interested in and click follow. You can check all followed users in your following list.

5.question: How can I send private messages?
5.answer: Open the target user's profile and click message to start a conversation. You can review all conversations in the chat page.

1.title: Community Rules
1.content: Please keep content friendly and positive. Illegal, violent, explicit or discriminatory content is not allowed.

2.title: Privacy
2.content: Protect your personal information and avoid sharing sensitive details like ID numbers or bank cards publicly.

3.title: Account Security
3.content: Use strong passwords and update them regularly. Do not share credentials. Enabling 2FA improves account safety.

Premium.subtitle: Fewer ads, stronger features, and better visibility for your content

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.body: Welcome to Gekaixing. These Terms of Service govern your use of our website and related services. By accessing or using the service, you confirm that you have read, understood, and agreed to these terms. If you do not agree, please stop using the service.

items.0: You must have legal capacity in your jurisdiction to use this service.
items.1: You agree to use the service only for lawful purposes and in compliance with applicable laws.
items.2: You are responsible for your account activities, posted content, and interactions on the platform.
items.3: We may update, suspend, or discontinue parts of the service when necessary.

account.title: 3. User Accounts
account.body: You may need an account to access some features. You are responsible for safeguarding your account credentials and for all activities under your account. If you suspect unauthorized access, contact us promptly.

ip.title: 4. Intellectual Property
ip.body: All content and software in this service are protected by intellectual property laws and are owned by Gekaixing or its licensors. You may not copy, modify, distribute, sell, or lease any part of the service without prior written permission.

disclaimer.title: 5. Disclaimer and Limitation of Liability
disclaimer.body: The service is provided on an "as is" and "as available" basis without warranties of any kind. To the maximum extent permitted by law, we are not liable for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from your use of the service.

termination.title: 6. Termination
termination.body: You may stop using the service at any time. We may suspend or terminate your access if you violate these terms or when required for security and compliance reasons.

contact.title: 7. Contact Us
contact.body: If you have any questions about these terms, please contact us:

Privacy.title: Gekaixing Privacy Policy
Privacy.intro: We value your privacy. This policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and protect information when you use Gekaixing.

collectedInfo.title: 1. Information We Collect
collectedInfo.summary: We may collect the following categories of information:

items.0: Identity and profile information, such as name and email when you register.
items.1: Account and usage data generated while you use our product features.
items.2: Technical information such as IP address, browser type, device information, and visited pages.

items.0: Provide, maintain, and improve our services.
items.1: Authenticate users, secure accounts, and prevent abuse.
items.2: Communicate important account and product updates.

sharing.title: 3. Sharing and Disclosure
sharing.summary: We do not sell personal information. We may share data in these cases:

items.0: With service providers that help us operate the product.
items.1: When required by law, regulation, or valid legal process.
items.2: During business transfers such as merger, acquisition, or asset sale.

cookies.title: 4. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.body: We use cookies and similar technologies to keep you signed in, remember preferences, analyze traffic, and improve performance.

security.title: 5. Data Security
security.body: We implement reasonable technical and organizational safeguards to protect personal information, but no system can be completely secure.

rights.title: 6. Your Rights
rights.body: Depending on your jurisdiction, you may have rights to access, correct, delete, or restrict the processing of your personal information.

contact.title: 7. Contact Us
contact.body: If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please contact us:

Cookies.title: Gekaixing Cookie Policy
Cookies.intro: This policy explains how Gekaixing uses cookies and similar technologies.

whatIsCookie.title: 1. What Are Cookies?
whatIsCookie.body: Cookies are small text files stored in your browser when you visit a website. They help the site remember settings, session status, and preferences.

howWeUse.title: 2. How We Use Cookies
howWeUse.summary: We use cookies for the following purposes:

items.0: Essential cookies: required for core features and secure access.
items.1: Functional cookies: remember your preferences such as language and settings.
items.2: Analytics cookies: understand traffic and usage patterns to improve the product.
items.3: Advertising cookies: measure and improve marketing effectiveness where applicable.

thirdParty.title: 3. Third-Party Cookies
thirdParty.body: Some cookies may be set by third-party services such as analytics or embedded content providers. Their use is governed by their own privacy policies.

manage.title: 4. Managing Cookie Preferences
manage.body1: You can control or disable cookies in your browser settings.
manage.body2: Disabling cookies may affect the availability or performance of some features.

contact.title: 5. Contact Us
contact.body: If you have any questions about this cookie policy, please contact us:
